text:
Johnson-Bryant – Residential Advisor Job Posting

Company Background:
Johnson-Bryant is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive community. We believe in empowering individuals through equitable opportunities and creating a work environment that reflects the diverse talents of our team members.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
Johnson-Bryant is seeking a Residential Advisor to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of our residential facilities, ensuring a safe and supportive environment for all residents.

Responsibilities:
- Provide guidance and support to residents.
- Develop and implement community-building activities.
- Mediate conflicts and offer effective solutions.
- Ensure adherence to residential policies and procedures.
- Coordinate with other departments for maintenance and services.
- Maintain accurate records and reports.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor's degree in social work, psychology, or a related field.
- Minimum of 2 years of experience in a similar role.
- Excellent negotiation and conflict resolution skills.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.
- Strong organizational and project planning abilities.
- Commitment to fostering an inclusive community.

Perks and Benefits:
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Professional development opportunities.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 50,000 to USD 65,000, based on your experience and skills.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter to our HR department at careers@johnsonbryant.com.

Join Johnson-Bryant and be part of a team that values diversity and inclusion.
